SKT_FIRST.name: Splash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals increased damage if the caster has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals increased damage if the caster has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n자신이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color> 보유 시 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n自分が<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Diligent Worker
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect)\n<color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> increases proportional to missing Health. Attack can increase up to <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
description: (Passive Effect)\n<color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> increases proportional to missing Health. Attack can increase up to <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000045_2_1]</color>.

2_jp: (パッシブ効果)最大攻撃力のUP量+5%
3_jp: (パッシブ効果)最大攻撃力のUP量+5%
4_jp: (パッシブ効果)最大攻撃力のUP量+5%
5_jp: (パッシブ効果)最大攻撃力のUP量+5%

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 체력이 감소할수록 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 증가합니다. 공격력은 최대 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)残りHPが低いほど<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>がUPする。攻撃力は最大<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>までUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Water Ball
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and gains a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Reduces Water Ball Cooldown by 2 turns
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 【ウォータープリズン】の\nスキルターン-2ターン

description: Attacks an enemy and gains a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000045_3_1] turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 획득합니다. 실드량은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 높을수록 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間獲得する。自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が高いほどシールド量がUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers the caster's Action Points by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases if the caster has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers the caster's Action Points by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000045_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases if the caster has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color> 보유 시 적에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、自分のAPを<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>がある場合、敵に与えるダメージがUPする。
